data.text: @PPEtoheros @DrEricDing @kprather88 @AbraarKaran @jljcolorado @emilyakopp @colbertlateshow @dgurdasani1 @RickABright @SenSanders @SenWarren @POTUS @masknerd @yaneerbaryam @DrLaPook @NationalNurses @nynursesunited @luckytran @JimmyKimmelLive @TheDailyShow @SethMacFarlane @LateNightSeth It’s the Afghan strategy. Abandon the field to the enemy, betray the people, and declare victory.

@LazarusLong13 @danaparish @DrEricDing @kprather88 @AbraarKaran @jljcolorado @emilyakopp @colbertlateshow @dgurdasani1 @RickABright @SenSanders @SenWarren @POTUS @masknerd @yaneerbaryam @DrLaPook @NationalNurses @nynursesunited @luckytran @JimmyKimmelLive @TheDailyShow @SethMacFarlane @LateNightSeth @BernieDogs4 We all make wrong calls. Let’s hope the democrats don’t make the wrong call of trying to focus on votes & the midterms rather than taking the steps we need to keep Americans safe which would also save the economy as a side effect.

@PPEtoheros @LazarusLong13 @danaparish @DrEricDing @kprather88 @AbraarKaran @jljcolorado @emilyakopp @colbertlateshow @dgurdasani1 @RickABright @SenSanders @SenWarren @POTUS @masknerd @yaneerbaryam @DrLaPook @NationalNurses @nynursesunited @luckytran @JimmyKimmelLive @TheDailyShow @SethMacFarlane @LateNightSeth @BernieDogs4 we have been given means to arm ourselves against it. use them.

@PPEtoheros @danaparish @DrEricDing @kprather88 @AbraarKaran @jljcolorado @emilyakopp @colbertlateshow @dgurdasani1 @RickABright @SenSanders @SenWarren @POTUS @masknerd @yaneerbaryam @DrLaPook @NationalNurses @nynursesunited @luckytran @JimmyKimmelLive @TheDailyShow @SethMacFarlane @LateNightSeth @BernieDogs4 Urgencyofnormal could have weaponized it later...if it had been disinformation.

Still...sorry on the wrong call!

@PPEtoheros @danaparish @DrEricDing @kprather88 @AbraarKaran @jljcolorado @emilyakopp @colbertlateshow @dgurdasani1 @RickABright @SenSanders @SenWarren @POTUS @masknerd @yaneerbaryam @DrLaPook @NationalNurses @nynursesunited @luckytran @JimmyKimmelLive @TheDailyShow @SethMacFarlane @LateNightSeth @BernieDogs4 I agree it's most likely (99%)  the same letter.
 
So I was wrong on the gut call.

Given the source being an urgencyofnormal member? I would do the same thing all over again.

And getting huge accounts that are members of 
a just released urgencyofequity to bite on misinfo?

@danaparish @LazarusLong13 @DrEricDing @kprather88 @AbraarKaran @jljcolorado @emilyakopp @colbertlateshow @dgurdasani1 @RickABright @SenSanders @SenWarren @POTUS @masknerd @yaneerbaryam @DrLaPook @NationalNurses @nynursesunited @luckytran @JimmyKimmelLive @TheDailyShow @SethMacFarlane @LateNightSeth @BernieDogs4 While a lot of people hoped the letter was fake, NBC News is reporting that is not only real but that politicians are already using it in their talking points. Hopefully people like @DrEricDing can draw attention to the fact the war on COVID will now get worse instead of better. https://t.co/CiZPhWm1QR
